mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(ID, EMAIL, NAME, PASSWORD, TYPE) VALUES (MEMBER_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{name}, #{password}, 'guest')
mapper.select: select ID, EMAIL, NAME, TYPE from MEMBER where EMAIL = #{email} AND PASSWORD = #{password} AND STATUS = 'enabled'
SELECT ID, EMAIL, NAME, TYPE, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-DD') regdate FROM MEMBER ORDER BY regdate DESC
